text: Nibabulale naphi na apho nibafumana khona, nibagxothe, nibakhuphe apho banigxotha banikhupha khona. Kuba iFitnah63 imbi kunokubulala. Ke kaloku musani ukubalwa eMasjid eNgcwele ngaphandle kokuba bona (baqale) banilwa khona apho, kodwa ukuba bayanihlasela, babulaleni, oko kuya kuba ngumvuzo wabangakholwayo
